connect_account.title: Connect your Facebook account
connect_account.description: Connect with Facebook to get your products into your own Facebook Shop.

business_manager.title: Business manager
business_manager.description: Connect with Facebook manager you use to manage Facebook page, accounts, and product catalog. You need to be an admin to be able to connect a business manager.

domain_verification.title: Domain verification
domain_verification.description: Verify your Facebook domain, so they can define that you’re the owner of it

facebook_page.title: Facebook page
facebook_page.description: Connect with Facebook pages you want to sell or post ads. You need to be an admin to be able to connect a page.

data_sharing.title: Data sharing (Facebook Pixel)
data_sharing.description: Facebook collects data about your customers so they can use it to retarget them through your ads, which helps your business grow.

commerce_account.title: Facebook commerce account
commerce_account.description: Create a Facebook commerce account to start selling on Facebook, Instagram, or both once you have one. You'll be able to customize your Facebook shop

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms & conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: You need to accept Facebook terms of service

connect_account.title: Connect your Google account
connect_account.description: Connect with Google to get your products into your own Google merchant center.

payment_method.title: Confirm some details
payment_method.description: Activate payment method so Google can make sure your store is trustworthy

method.title: Payment
method.description: Add payment method for your store, so your customers can pay you online

method.title: Pages
method.description: Add a refund policy and terms of service

method.title: Contact
method.description: Confirm you have 2 contact methods on your online store

connect_account.title: Connect your Twitter  account
connect_account.description: Connect with Twitter  to get your products into your own Twitter  Shop.

business_manager.title: Business manager
business_manager.description: Connect with Twitter  manager you use to manage Twitter  page, accounts ,and product catalog, You need to be an admin to be able to connect a business manager.

domain_verification.title: Domain verification
domain_verification.description: Veify your Twitter  domain, so they can define that you’re the owner of it

platform_page.title: Twitter  page
platform_page.description: Connect with Twitter  pages you want to sell or post ads, You need to be an admin to be able to connect a page.

data_sharing.title: Data sharing (Twitter  Pixel)
data_sharing.description: Twitter  collect data about your customers so they can use it to retarget them through your ads, which help your business grow.

commerce_account.title: Twitter  commerce account
commerce_account.description: Create a Twitter  commerce account to start selling on Twitter , Instagram or both once you have one, You'll be able to customize your Twitter  shop

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms & conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: You need to accept Twitter  terms of service
